Articles.Content:
Anyone know of a work-arround to keep struts within a sumbassembly from loosing their connection when placed?

I created a basic self-propelled rover and wanted to put it into my spaceplane. Unfortunately all struts are gone now and strutting it within there without mirroring both ends of the rover would prolly lead to assymetry problems.

Edited August 10, 2014 by TrooperCooper

Unless it's changed recently, make sure you grab the whole thing when you drop it in to make a sub-assembly. DON'T Alt+Click to copy and drop. That seems to break struts and fuel lines.

Cheers,

~Claw
